title: The Moth Radio Hour: Live at Town Hall, New York
description:
A real fashionista auditions for a key role in The Devil Wears Prada; a tough guy father deals with his sensitive son; and an expectant mother gets unsettling news about her unborn child.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.

Hosted by: Jay Allison

Storytellers: Simon Doonan, Kemp Powers, Lynn Ferguson
